aiPresent.label: AI present
aiPresent.description: Specify whether the system uses AI functionality.

purpose.label: Purpose & scope
purpose.description: Briefly describe the purpose and scope of the AI used.

data.label: Data & processing
data.description: Capture whether and which employee data is processed.

personalDataCategories.label: Data categories
personalDataCategories.placeholder: e.g. only login data, name, e-mail, etc.

model.label: Model & architecture
model.description: Provide details about the AI model and its deployment.

version.label: Version
version.placeholder: Version (e.g. GPT-4o, Gemini 2.5 Pro, Claude 3.7, etc.)

region.label: Region
region.placeholder: Deployment region (e.g. DE, EU, USA, etc.)

autonomy.label: Autonomy & permissions
autonomy.description: Determine the autonomy level of the AI and required permissions.

thresholds.label: Thresholds
thresholds.help: Defines when decisions are automated or reviewed by humans.

permissionDimensions.label: Permission dimensions
permissionDimensions.help: Describes the levels at which the AI receives permissions (e.g. data access, functions).

transparency.label: Transparency
transparency.description: How is transparency regarding AI usage ensured for users?

transparencyNotice.label: AI notice is shown in the UI

risk.label: Risk
risk.description: Assess the risk according to the EU AI Act and corporate classification.

eu_ai_act.label: Classification according to EU AI Act

dea.label: Digital Ethics Assessment (DEA)
dea.description: Document the result of the Digital Ethics Assessment.
